story.hline: Abu Jayed expresses disappointment after Test exclusion
story.intro: The seamer has been dropped since the BCB selectors opted to pick fast bowlers with more pace on offer
story.seoHeadline: Abu Jayed expresses disappointment after Test exclusion

coverImage.caption: Jayed didn't get an opportunity in New Zealand and South Africa as well.

story.intro: The 36-year-old stood tall with an outstanding knock but couldn't prevent Chennai Super Kings from falling short

story.hline: PBKS hold nerve to fend off CSK to revive campaign
story.intro: CSK fell short by 11 runs despite a superb 39-ball 78 from Ambati Rayudu

coverImage.caption: With 27 runs needed in the last over, CSK could only manage 15 runs.

story.hline: Mehidy ruled out of opening Test against Sri Lanka due to finger injury

story.hline: RCB seek top-order thrust to shrug off the bad inertia
